name: spring-initializr
title: Spring Initializr
description: Spring Initializr is a tool that simplifies the creation of Spring Boot projects.
author: danvega

commands.name: spring-initializr
commands.title: Spring Initializr
commands.subtitle: Create a new Spring Boot Application
commands.description: Create a new Spring Boot Application

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
